edu.utah.bmi.ibiomes.local.chem

Interface LocalExperiment

  • All Superinterfaces:
    LocalDirectory
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AMBERCollection, CHARMMCollection, DefaultLocalExperimentImpl, GAMESSCollection, GaussianCollection, GROMACSCollection, LocalExperimentImpl, NAMDCollection, NWChemCollection

    public interface LocalExperiment
extends LocalDirectory
    Interface to handle local file collections that need to be published into iRODS.
    Author:
    Julien Thibault
